name: Lost Frequency
summary: Using your deep space scanner, you inadvertently make contact with Captain Paul Renzo of The Orion Project. A space explorer of the Allied Space Exploration Cooperative, who is stranded on a foreign world and has lost his crew. His life is on the line and he needs your help! Why is he there? What happened? How will he escape the predicament he is in? Only you can help him navigate the dangers he faces on this foreign planet where he has crashed. You choose the adventure he will have. Play the game over and over picking new paths each time, you never know where Captain Renzo will end up.
